channel.title: Problems with my server
channel.description:
By the way im useing project 16 Problem #1 The first option in the right click menu dosnt work. SO you cant talk ,mine, cut wood, or any of the major skills.
Problem #2 There are only 4 quest and sine you cant talk to npcs ; you cant do any quest
Problem #3 The Skills menu dosent work. I'm talking about where it list all the ores and bars that you can mine/make. On the sides the buttons are : Bronze,Iron,Steel,OPT 11,OPT 12,OPT13,(blank),(blank),(blank); On all the menus
Problem # 4 All/Most of the member citys are empty.
Problem #5 When ever I make shops. I always get 100 problems no matter what i do to try to fix it.
Problem #6 The tele funchion is broken. I always get "Wrong synaxe use: ::telly ####,####"

item.title: Problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @guttej5 guttej5
item.description:
@guttej5 wrote:

to person that replyed first
1. left click isnt working eaither unless its attack. Basicly i think its talk
3. ok
4. shure i’ll dload it
ands wats the code for.

second person to reply.

 If you dont know wat were talking about then y are you posting. Normal servers (in WoW talk) are servers by the original develobers (ex. WoW=blizzard RS= Jagex) Priate servers are privatly own servers that arnt by the original dev.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @cod_noob cod noob
item.description:
@cod_noob wrote:

Re: Problems with my server
« Reply #1 on: Today at 09:53:19 PM » Quote

  1. just click them then lol
  2. read up
    3)erm most servers dont really have that so it dosnt matter.
    4)you make those yourself
    5)use my shop maker
  3. ::tele xcoords ycoords like ::tele 1234 1234

make a .bat file and put this in there

Code:
echo NPC Id?
set /p NpcId=Option:
If not Exist ShopMakerFolder MD ShopMaker Folder
Echo [Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java] >> “.\ShopMaker\Shopmaker Code.txt”
Echo else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) { >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
Echo PutNPCCords = true; { >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
Echo WanneShop = 30; >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
goto menu2
:menu2
set /p ShopId=Shop Id:
pause
goto menu3
:menu3
cls
set /p ItemId=Item Id you want in your Shop:
pause
goto menu4
:menu4
cls
set /p Cost=Cost of that item:
Echo [Add in shops.cfg] { >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
Echo %ShopId% 1 1 %ItemId% %Cost%{ >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
pause
goto menu5
:menu5
cls
Echo [Add in autospawn.cfg] { >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
set /p cords=Cords X:
pause
goto menu6
:menu6
set /p coords=Cords Y:
pause
goto menu7
:menu7
Echo %NpcId% %cords% %coords% 0 0 0 0 1{ >> “.\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt”
goto finished
:finished
echo finished.
pause
goto menu

commandmaker make a .bat file and paste this in there

Code:
@echo off
color 02
:index
set voi=commands.txt
set dir=.
if exist .\sources set dir=.\sources
if exist .\Sources set dir=.\Sources
set code=
set code1=
set code2=
set code3=
set code4=
set code5=
set code6=
set code7=
set code8=
set code9=
set code10=
cls
title Codemaker By S0cc3r
echo.
echo Command maker by S0cc3r
echo.
echo How to use:
echo.
echo 1-Type the letter “s” and press “enter”,
echo 2-Choose a name for your command,
echo 3-Choose which type of command you would like to create,
echo 4-Add what you would like your command to do,
echo 5-Copy your new code from the new commands text file,
echo 6-Paste your new command into your client.java
echo.
echo This program is copyrighted 2007-2008 Moparsc4p3 and s0cc3r pk LTD.
echo.
echo s - Start making the command.
echo e - Leave the Code Generator.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==s goto step1a
if %opt%==S goto step1a
if %opt%==start goto step1a
if %opt%==e goto end
if %opt%==E goto end
if %opt%==exit goto end
if %opt%==* goto er
goto er
:er
title Codemaker by s0cc3r
cls
echo Unrecognized command. Make sure you are spelling
echo the commands correctly.
pause
goto index
:er2
title Codemaker by s0cc3r
cls
echo You do not have commands.txt. Would you like to
echo create it now?
echo.
echo.
set /p yn=(Y/N)?
if %yn%==y goto y
if %yn%==Y goto y
if %yn%==yes goto y
if %yn%==Yes goto y
if %yn%==YES goto y
if %yn%==n goto n
if %yn%==N goto n
if %yn%==no goto n
if %yn%==No goto n
if %yn%==NO goto n
if %yn%==* goto er
goto er
:y
echo //made by command maker >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.io.; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.StringTokenizer; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.Calendar; >> %dir%commands.txt
echo import java.util.GregorianCalendar; >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1
:n
cls
echo You can not continue until you have commands.txt.
pause
goto intro
:end
cls
exit
:step1
cls
title Codemaker - Step 1
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
:step1a
cls
title codemaker - Step 2
set /p name=What is the name of the command?
:step1b
echo Now select which features you would like.
echo a - teleport, additem and sendmessage
echo 1 - teleport and additem
echo 2 - additem and sendmessage
echo 3 - teleport and sendmessage
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==a goto step1g
if %opt3%==A goto step1g
if %opt3%==all goto step1g
if %opt3%==1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==sel1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==SEL1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==sel2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==SEL2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==sel3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==SEL3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%== goto er
:stepsel1
cls
title codemaker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==F goto step1e
if %opt3%==finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==item goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==I goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==tele goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==T goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel2
cls
title codemaker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with additem
echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo i - (first)Adds additem to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==Item goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepall
cls
title codemaker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo m - (third)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto step1d
if %opt3%==Message goto step1d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto step1d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto step1x
if %opt3%==Item goto step1x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto step1x
if %opt3%==t goto step1g
if %opt3%==Tele goto step1g
if %opt3%==TELE goto step1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel3
cls
title codemaker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==Tele goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==TELE goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel1x
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel1f
:step1x
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto step1d

:stepsel2x
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel2d

:stepsel2d
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel2f
:step1d
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto step1f
:step1g
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto step1z
:step1z
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto step1x
:stepsel3d
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel3f
:stepsel3g
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel3z
:stepsel3z
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel3d
:stepsel1g
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel1z
:stepsel1z
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel1x
:step1f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel3f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel2f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel1f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:step1fa
if %nummess% GEQ 2 goto step1fb
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g

:step1fc
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
:step1g
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo The command was created and added to commands.txt
echo successfully! Where would you like to go now?
echo.
echo i - Takes you to the Index page.
echo e - Exits out of the Generator.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt5=Option:
if %opt5%==i goto index
if %opt5%==Index goto index
if %opt5%==INDEX goto index
if %opt5%==e goto end
if %opt5%==Exit goto end
if %opt5%==EXIT goto end
if %opt5%==* goto er
goto er

« Last Edit: Today at 09:55:14 PM by adog17x » Report to moderator Logged

Quote from: dragonblood_dan on June 20, 2007, 12:47:51 AM
whats a private server? i’ll giv u a link to one if u can tell me whats the difference between a private server and a normal server?

item.title: Problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

  1. just click them then lol
  2. read up
    3)erm most servers dont really have that so it dosnt matter.
    4)you make those yourself

make a .bat file and put this in there

echo NPC Id? set /p NpcId=Option: If not Exist ShopMakerFolder MD ShopMaker Folder Echo [Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] >> ".\ShopMaker\Shopmaker Code.txt" Echo else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo PutNPCCords = true; { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo WanneShop = 30; >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" goto menu2 :menu2 set /p ShopId=Shop Id: pause goto menu3 :menu3 cls set /p ItemId=Item Id you want in your Shop: pause goto menu4 :menu4 cls set /p Cost=Cost of that item: Echo [Add in shops.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo %ShopId% 1 1 %ItemId% %Cost%{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" pause goto menu5 :menu5 cls Echo [Add in autospawn.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" set /p cords=Cords X: pause goto menu6 :menu6 set /p coords=Cords Y: pause goto menu7 :menu7 Echo %NpcId% %cords% %coords% 0 0 0 0 1{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" goto finished :finished echo finished. pause goto menu

title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel1x
:step1f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel3f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel2f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel1f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:step1fa
if %nummess% GEQ 2 goto step1fb
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g

:step1fc
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
:step1g
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo The command was created and added to commands.txt
echo successfully! Where would you like to go now?
echo.
echo i - Takes you to the Index page.
echo e - Exits out of the Generator.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt5=Option:
if %opt5%==i goto index
if %opt5%==Index goto index
if %opt5%==INDEX goto index
if %opt5%==e goto end
if %opt5%==Exit goto end
if %opt5%==EXIT goto end
if %opt5%==* goto er
goto er[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @guttej5 guttej5
item.description:
@guttej5 wrote:

By the way im useing project 16
Problem #1
The first option in the right click menu dosnt work. SO you cant talk ,mine, cut wood, or any of the major skills.

Problem #2
There are only 4 quest and sine you cant talk to npcs ; you cant do any quest

Problem #3
The Skills menu dosent work. I’m talking about where it list all the ores and bars that you can mine/make.
On the sides the buttons are : Bronze,Iron,Steel,OPT 11,OPT 12,OPT13,(blank),(blank),(blank); On all the menus

Problem # 4
All/Most of the member citys are empty.

Problem #5
When ever I make shops. I always get 100 problems no matter what i do to try to fix it.

Problem #6
The tele funchion is broken. I always get “Wrong synaxe use: ::telly ####,####”

Read full topic
